name: One Night (itch) (Timur Agaev)
description:
Escape from the anime girls...

FNaF parody.

You are hired to Freddy's pizzeria, where you will have to be a security guard and survive. It will not be easy to go this way, animatronics want to destroy you. Prevent them from doing this and do not fall into the clutches of insidious robots!
